mapper.sql: REV_ID, REV_TYPE, DOCUMENTNUMBER, PRODUCTTYPE, CIFNUMBER, CIFNAME, MAINCIFNUMBER, MAINCIFNAME, ACCOUNTOFFICER, CCBDBRANCHUNITCODE, FACILITYID, FACILITYTYPE, FACILITYREFERENCENUMBER, ALLOCATIONUNITCODE, STATUS, LONGNAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, PASSONRATETHIRDTOUSD, PASSONRATETHIRDTOPHP, PASSONRATEUSDTOPHP, SPECIALRATETHIRDTOUSD, SPECIALRATETHIRDTOPHP, SPECIALRATEUSDTOPHP, URR, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, FIRSTNAME, MIDDLENAME, LASTNAME, TINNUMBER, EXCEPTIONCODE, OFFICERCODE, PROCESSINGUNITCODE
mapper.insert: insert into TRADEPRODUCT_AUDIT ( REV_ID, REV_TYPE, DOCUMENTNUMBER, PRODUCTTYPE, CIFNUMBER, CIFNAME, MAINCIFNUMBER, MAINCIFNAME, ACCOUNTOFFICER, CCBDBRANCHUNITCODE, FACILITYID, FACILITYTYPE, FACILITYREFERENCENUMBER, ALLOCATIONUNITCODE, STATUS, LONGNAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, PASSONRATETHIRDTOUSD, PASSONRATETHIRDTOPHP, PASSONRATEUSDTOPHP, SPECIALRATETHIRDTOUSD, SPECIALRATETHIRDTOPHP, SPECIALRATEUSDTOPHP, URR, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, FIRSTNAME, MIDDLENAME, LASTNAME, TINNUMBER, EXCEPTIONCODE, OFFICERCODE, PROCESSINGUNITCODE ) values (#{revId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{revType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{documentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cifNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cifName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainCifNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainCifName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountOfficer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccbdBranchUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{facilityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{facilityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{facilityReferenceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allocationUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passOnRateThirdToUsd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{passOnRateThirdToPhp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{passOnRateUsdToPhp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{specialRateThirdToUsd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{specialRateThirdToPhp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{specialRateUsdToPhp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{urr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processingUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
